Package imusim :: Package maths :: Module quaternions :: Class QuaternionArray

Class QuaternionArray

An array of quaternion values.

Math operators are overridden to support quaternion math operations.

Method Details

__init__(...)
(Constructor)

 

Construct quaternion array.

A QuaternionArray can be constructed from:

  • A sequence of Quaternion objects.
  • A 4-element list or tuple of arrays giving w,x,y,z components.
  • An Nx4 array of quaternion component values.
  • Another QuaternionArray.
Parameters:
  • data - Data from which to construct the array.
  • copy - If the source is an existing Nx4 array or QuaternionArray, whether to copy the data. If not it will be referenced in place.
Overrides: object.__init__

__repr__(...)
(Representation operator)

 

repr(x)

Overrides: object.__repr__
(inherited documentation)

rotateFrame(...)

 

Rotate co-ordinate frames of vectors using these quaternions.

Equivalent to q.conjugate*v*q for each q and v.

Parameters:
  • v - 3xN np.ndarray of column vectors, where N equals the length of this quaternion array.
Returns:
The vectors as they appear in the rotated co-ordinate frames obtained by applying the rotations given by these quaternions to their current co-ordinate frame.

rotateVector(...)

 

Rotate vectors by the rotations of these quaternions.

Equivalent to q*v*q.conjugate for each q and v.

Parameters:
  • v - 3xN np.ndarray of column vectors.
Returns:
The vectors as they appear in their current co-ordinate frame after applying the rotations specified by these quaternions to them.

smoothed(...)

 

Obtain a smoothed array of quaternions.

Smoothing is perfomed using a cubic spline for each quaternion component. It is assumed that the time between quaternions is constant.

Parameters:
  • stddev - Standard deviation of the noise expected in each component.
